A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson and team did a commendable job of meeting the understandably high expectations for this film and showing that Disney can actually sustain a certain level of quality and freshness stories of the galaxy far\, far away\, though the film is not perfect and has at least one major plot problem.\n\nFull non-spoiler review here: http://www.curtisweyant.com/blog/spoiler-free-star-wars-viii-review/
